events.message: The customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred on 2024-04-28 involving their car and another driver at an intersection.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and confirming that the incident involved a car collision.
An insurance agent specializing in vehicle accidents was assigned to manage the customer’s claim and guide them through the process.
The insurance company acknowledged receipt of the auto accident claim and informed the customer about the next steps and required documentation.
The company requested additional documents including the police report, photographs of the damaged vehicle, and the customer’s driver license.
The customer submitted all the requested documents on time, including the collision report and pictures showing the extent of the damage to their car.
The investigation team started reviewing the submitted evidence along with the police statement to determine liability for the vehicle collision.
Investigation concluded that the other party was at fault for the accident, and the vehicle damage aligns with the described collision circumstances.
A settlement offer was proposed covering the full repair cost of the customer's damaged vehicle as per the investigation’s findings.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the settlement proposal and appreciated the prompt and clear communication by the insurance agent.
Based on the investigation results and customer agreement, the claim was officially approved for payout.
The payment to cover the vehicle repair costs was issued and transferred to the customer's bank account on the specified date.
After payment confirmation and no further inquiries, the auto accident claim was officially closed as resolved and completed.
